Item.Value: [Text:Hi! Welcome to the Blue Hare Inn. I'm $NPC_19$. I hope the road wasn't too bad to get here.][Name:Introduction]
[Text:You seem stressed, have you been making sure to get enough rest? A warrior is useless without sleep.][Default][Name:2]
[Text:Is that for me? Oh! Thank you! It's just what I've been looking for! How did you know?][Name:Collection]
[Text:Nice to see you hon, we don't get too many customers on cold days like this. Why don't you treat yourself to something warm at the bar?][Weather:Snowing][Name:Snowing|1]

[Text:Sometimes, days like these remind me of when $NPC_17$ and I first met. It was the dead of winter and he'd just come into the tavern I was performing at, bundled up in his coat. There was something about him that caught my eye immediately.][Weather:Snowing][Name:Snowing|2]
[Text:You know, I kind of love the rain now that I'm not on the road anymore. I hated it back then though. Now? It's nice to be warm inside and watch it fall.][Weather:Raining][Name:Rain|1]
[Text:Huh, rain? Guess we're not going to have too many customers tonight, huh?][Weather:Raining][Name:Rain|2]

[Text:Best be careful if you're gonna go exploring hon, I was out on the edge of the forest the other day, just minding my own business when I saw something creeping around. I didn't get a good look at it, but it didn't seem like a good idea to stick around.][Name:Dialogue|3]
